title: New: Vaults – Cry No More
content:
This is a little bit special.

Sweeping synth sections, perfectly pitched female vocals that everyone is a sucker for and a hook just ripe for the remixing. London’s Vaults are keeping it minimal for the moment with regards to information, which probably means that they have a decent team behind them (that’s how it works, right?). Their debut track, Cry No More, is one of those moments that’ll have you staring in the mirror, howling back each and every word to yourself, pretending that your reflection cares. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
